article.headline: S. Utah 57, Sacramento St. 53
article.story: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) -- Geoff Payne had 29 points, five rebounds, three assists and three steals to help Southern Utah erase an eight-point deficit in the second half to beat Sacramento State 57-53 on Wednesday night. Orlando Griego had seven points and seven rebounds for the Thunderbirds (1-1). Loren Leath had 14 points and two steals and Vinnie McGhee had 10 points and seven assists for the Hornets (1-2). Donald Thomas' basket gave the Hornets a 42-34 lead midway through the second half, but the Thunderbirds battled back to take a 53-50 lead on one free throw by Rick Roberts and two free throws by Payne with 2:18 left. Roderick Adams tied it with a 3-pointer on the Hornets' next possession, but a basket by Roberts, a free throw by Griego and two more free throws by Payne in the last 1:39 sealed it. The Thunderbirds led 11-10 on a basket by Tyler Quinney early in the first half before Sacramento State put together a 15-7 run to make the score 25-18 with 2:30 left. The Hornets hit five 3-pointers and forced 15 Southern Utah turnovers to lead 29-24 at the half.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
